section.name: Quick Start
section.p: At this moment Hippo ECM is still in a development stage. To run it, it is necessary to checkout the sources from the SVN repository, and build them using Maven. A full guide can be found under Building with Maven. The short version below is targeted at those who know what they are doing.

subsection.name: Build Hippo ECM and deploy using Maven and Jetty
Run Hippo ECM
subsection.p: Finally, direct your browser to http://localhost:8080/.

subsection.name: Build Hippo ECM and deploy in application container
subsection.source: ~/> svn co https://svn.hippocms.org/repos/hippo/hippo-ecm/trunk hippo-ecm ~/> cd hippo-ecm ~/> mvn package
